entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor hot reload does not work when using StaticWebAsset apps #49348
  • Upload build artifact with build info in 2.1 #49347
    2.1.x
  • Perf regression: json #49342
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #49341
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33170: .NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #49334
  • Extend `EntityFrameworkCoreDataProtectionExtensions.PersistKeysToDbContext` to accept both TContextService and TContextImplementation #49329
  • HttpContext.Features.Get<IFormFeature>() returns null unless HttpContext.Request.HasFormContentType is called first #49325
  • ASP.NET MVC does not work on dotnet sdk 7.0.304+ #49320
  • Blazor-Server bypassing form (model) validations. #49319
  • Quarantine CanStartAndStopConnectionUsingGivenTransport #49315
  • Blazor Web App template should enable server interactivity by default #49314
    8.0-rc1

Closed

  • Update RequestDelegateGenerator to use interceptors compiler feature #48289
    8.0-preview7
  • Use Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity instead of Duende.IdentityServer for Blazor WebAssembly App and ASP.NET Core Web API with Individual Accounts that is ASP.NET Core Hosted #46131
    8.0-preview7
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #49322
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json, mapaction #49289
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #49321
  • Installation of ASP.NET Core Runtime 6.0.9 Hosting bundle fails when the system is already installed with 6.0.14 #49116
  • Dependency Injected pooled instances #48172
  • Unable to route to Blazor component pages in the client assembly #49313
  • Two Map* methods on the same source line cause InvalidCastException with Request Delegate Generator #48383
    8.0-preview7
  • Razor Pages post to incorrect handler with "OnPost" and "OnPostXxx" #49194
  • Incorrect Resolution of Query Parameter in ASP.NET Core (.NET 7) #49255
  • Incorrect CSS import created when hosting multiple WASM apps not at root #47803
    Discussions
  • Inconsistent Result | [.Net Framework vs .Net Core] | Comparer<DateTime>.Default.Compare(DateTime.UtcNow, DateTime.UtcNow) #49326
  • Blazor app with interactive Router still does a full page load #49303
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext, updates #49288
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #49304
  • Data and Models folders are no longer created for new ASP.NET Core applications #25642
    Backlog
  • Custom web API convention + nullable = exception #17761
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Async resource filter AfterOnResourceExecution diagnostic event only emitted on short-circuit #47698
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Forms behavior clarifications #49340
    area-blazor
  • Return LockedOut result from TwoFactorSignInAsync after a failed call #49337
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Option to use JsonWebTokenHandler in oidc handler #49333
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Simplify BoxedStatusCodes storage in HostingMetrics.cs #49332
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • fix: Account for form attribute on checkbox tag input helper #49201 #49323
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add support for explicit IParsable<T>.TryParse in RDF. #49317
    area-minimal

Merged

  • Always return SignInResult.Failed if updating AccessFailedCount fails #49345
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, 8.0-preview7
  • Avoid file system for dataprotection in SignalR tests #49343
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview7
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #49336
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, 6.0.21
  • Update downlevel SiteExtension versions #49344
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Update branding to 2.1.40 #49346
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #49338
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, 7.0.10
  • Update area-owners.md #49331
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Update area-owners.md #49229
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Enable BinSkim scan in nightly validation #49324
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview7
  • Quarantine CanStartAndStopConnectionUsingGivenTransport #49316
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview7
  • Ignore NullableContextAttribute on convention methods. #49287
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • Fix for Async resource filter AfterOnResourceExecution diagnostic event only emitted on short-circuit #49274
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder #49246
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    Perf, area-networking
  • Change the way we detect Node.js in SignalR JS/TS client. #49066
    area-signalr
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly #48154
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript, pending-ci-rerun
  • add null check for User.Identity #49311
    area-identity, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2218978 #49267
    area-mvc
  • Remove TodoGenerator from Api template #49279
    area-mvc
  • Named events tracking #49298
    area-blazor
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • Redis distributed/output cache: include scenario in connection metadata #49291
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching
  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49233
    area-middleware
